name: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War II - Retribution Chaos Space Marines Race Pack
summary: Includes 4 unique ability and wargear items to equip your squad with.SKULL BREAKER: Hits on the enemy with this weapon have the chance to cause an explosive area of effect attack. ARMOR OF IMMORTAL: Gain the protection of an invulnerability shield when your character is critically injured.
